conbody.p: You can store your custom templates in a templates gallery. The templates stored in the gallery will be presented in the transformation scenario dialog as first items.
You can define your templates gallery by going to the DITA/Publishing preferences page and add more entries in the Additional Publishing Templates Galleries list.

section.title: Share Publishing Template with Your Team
section.p: This method allows you to easily share a publishing template with your team.

ul.li: copy your template in a folder, lets say webhelp-templates.
open the DITA/Publishing preferences page and add the above folder to the template galleries list.
To share the same preferences with your team, switch the DITA/Publishing preferences page as project level.
